Content: What am I doing in this place? Your faces are so horrible and disgusting. I loathe you all and your disgusting facades.
My selflove knows no bounds. Although I am kind enough to share. As an altruist being, it's only fair to serve a good portion
If give a chance, I will devour every day and every hour. Is over-indulgence a kind of curse? It never happens to get worse.
My name is Noah. I have sinned lots during my short and worthy life. I do not pledge to apologize in any way. I never apologize.
I have six siblings, but they say I'm the worst. You'll find me at the top, but I'll take you to the bottom.
The last thing from my life, I remember is enjoying time in bed during a cold December. Even if it was already noon. My stomach hurted so much I couldn't move.
No movement is what I do, in life some decribed me as blue. I'm not depressed nor tired but the time for movement has expired.
Oh my, you boys are all so handsome and young! It's good to see different faces once in a while. I haven't really sinned within my age but I have only enjoyed the joy of the flesh.
None can resist my charm. Following me won't lead you to any harm. Get too close and you'll be consumed. Fall for me and you'll be doomed.
Find wealth and you'll find me. The color green is your key. But if no riches can be found, you'll stay with me forever bound.
If you're privileged, I hate you I want everything so get a clue. Angering me wouln't be really wise. Specially if you have ties
I hide the malice in your heart I put on quite the stage. But friend and foe both play their part. To bring an end to every age.
